title: Revert Mordekaiser to his release state.

replies.body:
No.
If anything he'd need a partial revert and retuning.

Or you know, actually get a VGU.

I don't think so tbh he would still be easily kiteable

But why would they do that, when they could leave him as an unplayed, completely brokenly terrible mess? It's much more fun taking a champion with a dedicated player base, as small as it was, and turn him into complete dogshite. Look, as he ... ??? And he ... ??? Oh, and isn't played at all.
